messages.title: A strong voice for Spelthorne
messages.content:
My priorities for the Borough include: 
1. I am determined to protect the Green Belt, fight against inappropriate local development and champion local history and tradition. 
2. Community spirit is a great strength in the Borough and I want to see it thrive. I am involved in many local societies and clubs. 
3. I support local enterprise. Businesses create the wealth and jobs locally that we need. I have called for tax friendly reforms.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Determined to protect the Green Belt and fight against inappropriate local development.
Aims to strengthen community spirit and ensure it thrives, being actively involved in local societies and clubs.
Supports local enterprise, advocating for the creation of local wealth and jobs, including calls for tax friendly reforms.

issues.economy: I support local enterprise. Businesses create the wealth and jobs locally that we need. I have called for tax friendly reforms.
issues.environment: I am determined to protect the Green Belt, fight against inappropriate local development and champion local history and tradition.

images.caption: Image of Kwasi Kwarteng with the text 'Kwasi Kwarteng A strong voice for Spelthorne' and a description of his priorities for the borough.
